ref.full: Larriba, M.; Navarro, P.; Garcia, J.; Rodriguez, F. (2014) Fluid Phase Equilib. 364, 48-54.
ref.title: Liquid-liquid extraction of toluene from n-heptane by {[emim][TCM] + [emim][DCA]} binary ionic liquid mixtures

components.name: 1-ethyl-3-methyl-1H-imidazolium tricyanomethanide
sample: 0.2 water mass %;2 halide impurity mass %(dried in a desiccator)
